thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-TGS CEO aims to keep dividend at $0.2 per share in coming quarters

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TGS CEO aims to keep dividend at $0.2 per share in coming quarters
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Tgs Nopec Geophysical Company Asa :
* TGS CEO: EXPECTS TO PAY OUT DIVIDEND OF $0.20 PER SHARE ALSO IN THE COMING QUARTER; AIM IS TO PAY OUT THE WHOLE FREE CASH FLOW
* TGS CEO: WE HAVE INCREASED OR DIVIDEND (FROM $0.15 IN Q3) AND OUR AMBITION IS TO KEEP IT ON THAT LEVEL, IT WILL BE $0.8 FOR THE YEAR
* TGS CEO: EXPECTS WESTERN GECOâ€˜S EXIT FROM MARINE SEISMIC VESSEL MARKET TO BE NEUTRAL FOR TGS Further company coverage: (Reporting By Ole Petter Skonnord)
